content.raw:
This is here for convenience. Version 0 is in debian, but version 1 is not. So, anyone compiling from default would have to install ign-transport from source.

This won't affect the build because there is no code in default that uses ignition-transport.

We will actually switch to version 2 in a week or so, and it will be mandatory.
content.html:
This is here for convenience. Version 0 is in debian, but version 1 is not. So, anyone compiling from default would have to install ign-transport from source.

This won't affect the build because there is no code in default that uses ignition-transport.

We will actually switch to version 2 in a week or so, and it will be mandatory.
